author: Asaff Z
title: A real Gem in the heart of La Marais!
text:
I felt I have to share how lovely this place while I am still here.
It is a small boutique hotel with a perfect location- the Marais area is just magical- tons of small shops, cool bars and restaurants.
About the hotel itself-
1- the room is small but super practical and functional. The bad is very comfortable, the sower as well. It seems someone really thought on each signal item, and it works.
2- The service is superb. All hotel workers are highly helpful, smiles all the time.
3- breakfast- This is something special. (See in my pictures) first time I see full service in hotel breakfast. It is not a huge selection, yet again, everything is in high quality with a lot of thinking.
If you are looking for small and friendly hotel in the heart of Paris, this is your place without a doubt.
